headline: GUT: Utilities Are Decent In A Recession, But This Fund Has Flaws
summary: The Gabelli Utility Trust offers an 11.26% yield, significantly higher than peers, but its high premium and distribution sustainability are concerns. Read the full analysis on this CEF here.

headline: The Smartest High-Yield Dividend Stocks in Warren Buffett's "Secret Portfolio" to Buy Right Now
summary: Ares Capital offers an ultrahigh dividend yield and a history of delivering market-beating total returns.  Duke Energy is a safe haven with solid growth opportunities.  Verizon Communications has increased its dividend for 18 consecutive years.
